property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After you lose an unopposed challenge, sacrifice a Ranger character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Name a trait: Builder, Ranger, or Steward. Search the top X cards of your deck for any number of characters with that trait, reveal them, and add them to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck. X is your reserve value.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control: • Robb Stark, he gains insight. • Jon Snow, he gains stealth. • Bran Stark, he gains: "immune to opponents' plot effects." • Rickon Stark, he gains pillage.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Stark] character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. Action: Pay 1 gold to attach Lady to a different character. Then, if attached character is Sansa Stark, stand her. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Pay 1 gold to choose a participating House Redwyne character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you marshal Pleasure Barge, if you have not yet drawn any cards this phase, draw 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost of the first non-[Baratheon] character you marshal each round by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +1 STR. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating as an attacker, choose and kneel up to X total STR worth of characters, where X is attached character’s STR. Then, sacrifice King Robert's Warhammer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After you win a challenge in which The Hound is participating, you may discard 1 card at random from your hand. If you do not, return The Hound to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you become the first player, either: gain 1 gold, or draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When claim is applied for an unopposed [MIL] challenge in which you are the attacking player, kneel your faction card to choose a character without attachments, controlled by the losing opponent. Instead of the normal claim effects, kill that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When you gain power for winning an unopposed challenge, gain 2 power instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Merchant Prince has an attachment, he gets +1 STR and gains a [MIL] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you reveal a plot card, discard an attachment from your hand to choose an attachment with equal or lower printed cost, and discard it from play

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When Bastard Daughter or The Red Viper is killed, discard 1 card at random from each opponent’s hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: You do not return unspent gold to the treasury during the taxation phase. Reaction: After you lose a challenge, gain 1 gold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a [POW] challenge by 5 or more STR, search your deck for a location with printed cost 3 or lower, and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. (Max 1 per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a [POW] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to gain 1 power for your faction.

property.name: Text
property.value: During a challenge in which you control an attacking Army character, raise the claim value on Muster the Realm by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Search your deck for a Maester character with printed cost 3 or lower, and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: If you control a participating [Stark] character, kneel a Direwolf character or a character with a Direwolf attachment to have it participate in the current challenge on your side. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: During a [MIL] or [POW] challenge in which you control 2 or more unique participating [Stark] characters, each of those characters gets +2 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lady-in-Waiting may be marshaled as a duplicate (at no cost) on a Lady character you own and control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a Knight character that is attacking or defending alone, that character gains 1 power. (3 power instead if you control a Lady character.) (Max 1 per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Unsworn Apprentice gains a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you marshal a Builder character, reduce the cost of the next [Night's Watch] card you marshal this phase by 1. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After you lose an [INT] challenge, kneel Royal Entourage.

card.name: In the Name of Your King!

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only during a [MIL] challenge in which you are the defending player. Action: Kneel your faction card to end this challenge with no winner or loser. Until the end of the phase, you cannot initiate [MIL] challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, choose a player. That player may give you 1 gold from his or her gold pool. Until the end of the phase, if that player has not given you gold this phase, he or she cannot initiate [MIL] challenges against you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win an [INT] challenge, pay 2 gold to have the losing opponent choose and discard 2 cards from his or her hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which a unique [Greyjoy] character is participating, either: draw 1 card, or discard the top 3 cards from each opponent’s deck. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: If you are the first player, kneel Raiding Longship to choose a defending character without attachments. That character does not contribute its STR to this challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control another Bloodrider character, Rakharo gains intimidate. Reaction: After a character is killed to satisfy claim during a challenge you initiated, Rakharo gains 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the King trait. Attached character gets -4 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Choose an opponent’s character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice, and each Sand Snake character you control gains that challenge icon. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel your faction card to gain X gold. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a [MIL] icon and stealth. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win an [INT] challenge, kneel your faction card to search the top 10 cards of your deck for an in-faction event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each opponent gains 3 gold. (Cannot be canceled.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player chooses up to 2 locations he or she controls. Each location not chosen is discarded from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Ser Rodrik Cassel is attacking in a [MIL] challenge, each unique [Stark] character you control gains insight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel your faction card to search your deck for a Direwolf card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you marshal Ser Hobber Redwyne, search your deck for a Lady character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Knight character only. While attached character is attacking or defending alone, Mare in Heat gains: “Action: Kneel Mare in Heat to choose a participating character with STR higher than that of attached character, and remove that character from the challenge.”

property.name: Text
property.value: While you are the defending player, each [Night's Watch] character you control gains a [MIL] icon. Reaction: After a [MIL] challenge is initiated against you, kneel your faction card and pay 4 gold to put Ser Alliser Thorne into play from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Night's Watch] character only. Attached character gets +1 STR and gains a [MIL] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Moon Boy is participating, discard 1 card at random from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a [MIL] or [POW] challenge is initiated against you, the attacking player may either: kneel his or her faction card, or move 1 power from that faction card to yours. If that player does not, the challenge immediately ends with no winner or loser.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Ser Gregor Clegane discards a character using pillage, place that card in its owner’s dead pile. Then, you may choose and kill a character with printed cost equal to that card’s printed cost.

card.name: I Never Bet Against My Family

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Kneel your faction card to reveal the bottom 5 cards of your deck. You may put 1 unique [Lannister] character revealed by this effect into play; return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you marshal Newly-Made Lord, choose a non-limited location with printed cost 3 or lower, and discard it from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponent’s character only. Attached character cannot be declared as a defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a character is discarded from an opponent’s hand or deck, kneel a Dothraki character to place that card in its owner’s dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dothraki character or Daenerys Targaryen only. While attached character is participating in a [POW] challenge, it gains renown. Reaction: After attached character gains power using renown, sacrifice The Silver Steed. You may initiate an additional [POW] challenge this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponent’s character only. Attached character loses an [INT] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, place 1 vengeance token on The Boneway. Dominance Action: Kneel The Boneway and discard 6 vengeance tokens from it to gain 3 power for your faction.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control another Knight character, Hedge Knight gets +1 STR and gains a [POW] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +1 STR and gains the Knight trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the first challenge you initiate each phase, each of your participating characters gets –1 STR. During the third challenge you initiate each phase, each of your participating characters gets +2 STR. If you win this challenge, gain 1 power for your faction.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Knight character you control gains renown and “immune to opponents’ events.”

property.name: Text
property.value: Hodor cannot be declared as an attacker unless you control Bran Stark. Hodor does not contribute his STR to your total for dominance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating [Stark] character, kneel another [Stark] character to have it participate in that challenge on your side. (Limit twice per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Ser Horas Redwyne is knelt, choose and stand a Lady charater.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel a [Night's Watch] location or attachment to choose a [Night's Watch] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only during a [MIL] challenge. Challenges Action: Kneel 2 Ranger characters to kill each attacking character.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot lose (and your opponent cannot win) the first challenge initiated against you each phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win dominance, Gendry gains 1 power. Forced Reaction: After an opponent wins dominance, you may discard 1 power from Gendry. If you do not, sacrifice a Bastard character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win dominance, kneel Tobho Mott’s Armory to draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: During [INT] challenges, Red Cloaks gets +1 STR for each gold on it. Action: Move 1 gold from your gold pool to Red Cloaks. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponent’s character only. Reaction: After you win an [INT] challenge, kneel attached character. Then, that character’s controller may give you 1 gold from his or her gold pool to stand that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Drowned God character you control gets +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may only use gold from the losing opponent’s gold pool to pay for Loot. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, discard the top X cards from the losing opponent’s deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost to marshal Dothraki Outriders by 1 for each Dothraki character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each non-Dragon character gets –1 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Kneel Maester of Starfall to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses (choose one): insight, intimidate, pillage, or renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponent’s character only. Attached character loses a [POW] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice Wildling Scout to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, return each character with printed cost 3 or lower to its owner’s hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the reserve value on each opponent’s revealed plot card by 2 (to a minimum of 2).

property.name: Text
property.value: While there are fewer than 3 plots in your used pile, Greatjon’s Vanguard gets +2 STR and gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a unique [Stark] character you control is killed or sacrificed during the challenges phase, sacrifice Winterfell Crypt to choose a character with equal or lower printed STR. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, shuffle it back into its owner’s deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control a character with the highest STR in play, Roseroad Patrol gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Choose an Edict, Kingdom, or Scheme plot card in an opponent’s used pile. Initiate the when revealed ability on that card as if you had just revealed it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance Action: Kneel a Steward character to return a Direwolf or Raven card from your discard pile to your hand. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you marshal Northern Rookery, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: During [POW] challenges in which you are the defending player, each attacking character gets -1 STR. Forced Reaction: After you lose a [POW] challenge, sacrifice Kingswood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponent’s character only. Reaction: After attached character stands, sacrifice Stinking Drunk to kneel that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: During a challenge in which you are the defending player, Bronn gains a [MIL], an [INT], and a [POW] icon. Marshaling Action: Pay 1 gold to take control of Bronn. Any player may initiate this ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When claim is applied for an [INT] challenge, apply [MIL] claim instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Weapon card in your hand gains ambush (X). X is that card’s printed cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a character would be killed, sacrifice Iron Mines to save that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a challenge in which Mirri Maz Duur is attacking alone, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Instead of the normal claim effects, kill that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a non-Army character would be killed, save it. Then, attach Blood Magic Ritual to that character as a Condition attachment with the text: “Terminal. Treat attached character’s printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).”

property.name: Text
property.value: While there are 3 or more plot cards in your used pile, Knights of the Sun gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a challenge in which you are the defending player, choose an opponent. That player must satisfy the normal claim effect instead of you as if he or she were the defending player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a [MIL] challenge, kneel your faction card to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Weapon or Item attachment, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel The Eyrie to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be killed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a character or location. Until the end of the phase, treat that card’s printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).

property.name: Text
property.value: Increase the cost for each opponent to marshal each of his or her characters by 1.
